unsavedTabsDescription: You have {{count}} unsaved query tabs. Would you like to save these tabs before closing the application?
saveHint: Choose "Save": These tabs will be restored on next startup
discardHint: Choose "Don't Save": These tabs will be permanently discarded
detachHint: Continue dragging to detach tab to separate window
reattachHint: Drag here to reattach to main window
